With the return of the Prince Jumanji King Nod Wars madness was no more and he ordered his men to step down
All members of St. Anthony's parish were immediately excommunicated from the Church of the Terrifier,
which now had to earn the trust of the people, as did the King.

But he knew that his temporary madness had forever tarnished his once sterling reputation,
at least with those outside of Gal Gadot,
and so in an effort to maintain peace and make amends,
as to the demands of his challengers heretofore unthinkable.
For one, the dreaded pleasure men were now full members of King Nardwar's court.
Their worship of the minor god Discharge and their vision for a vile world built on the
principles of pleasure at all cost became almost customary and in some places bordered
on the prosaic.
While debauchery is often appreciated in the Terrifier kingdom, the differences between
the worshippers of Discharge and the church of the Terrifier spelled a cultural tension
to come, especially since the pleasure men were not so concerned with whether or not one
was terrified or born like the church was, nor did they stage a destabilizing coup or
try to revive a god who would have been really upset about being revived.
Meanwhile the brave lions were granted sovereign territory in the western part of the kingdom
in a new land called "It is real".
Perhaps a step back in their revolutionary fervor, but for many scaredy cats this was
enough.
Of course, hardliners still demanded more, and continued to organize and militarize around
the goal of the total annihilation of their former slave owners.
Sticky Fingers gang, meanwhile, have been given full pardon for their crimes, and a position
in the kingdom as members of the clandestine organization, the Night Terrors.
To what end, who knows?
Fuck You, meanwhile, ran the theme park idiot land, Stupidville, where he was finally given
his wizarding tower of terror.
While his home doubled as a ride, he was pleased as one could be, acting as a surrogate father
and leader to hundreds of idiot slaves.
Ola, meanwhile, still helped fund and advise on the theme park, but she also became business
partners and more with Thorax, whose gang grew in size and now acted as a private security
force for her conglomerate.
She used her considerable influence and association with the three heroes of Trebuchet Village
to expand her business and the influence of the city of Gal Gadot, whose ruler, the tiefling
Gorgonzola, was now poised to make a move on a weakened Nardwar.
The Prince Jumanji was forever changed.
The decision he made in the Terrifier Realm turned him into an ice cold warrior prince.
Everything his father thought he wanted him to be.
He'll never forget the time he spent with the three adventurers and the lessons they
taught him about what it means to be a man.
As for those three adventurers, Patrick, Dogen, and Evil, well they're heroes.
They ended a war that could have torn the kingdom apart before it even began.
They halted the resurrection of a beloved evil god who would have probably killed everyone
were he brought back, at least according to one particular creature.
Each of them were made minor lords of the Terrafire Kingdom, given a plot of land and
tons of gold.
They had their theme park that gave them a tidy profit, and they had their friends from
